original_definition: 'outdoor vacuum' means an appliance that is designed for use outdoors to collect debris such as grass clippings and leaves into a collector by means of an airflow created by underpressure developed within the unit and which may contain a shredding device and may also be able to perform as a blower;
generated_definition: 'outdoor vacuum' means a device used for cleaning outdoor surfaces, such as gardens, decks, and patios.

Article 2: ‘outdoor vacuum’ means an appliance that is designed for use outdoors to collect debris such as grass clippings and leaves into a collector by means of an airflow created by underpressure developed within the unit and which may contain a shredding device and may also be able to perform as a blower;
